lead_paragraph: Pakistan leg-spinner Yasir Shah has been given a three-month ban after pleading guilty to an inadvertent doping offence, the International Cricket Council said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan's Shah Banned for Three Months for Doping Offence
headline.main: Pakistan's Shah Banned for Three Months for Doping Offence
